text: In addition to protein , the ICIs observed in the limited bronchial epithelial samples were also partially composed of RNA . While the RNA could be of viral origin it is important to note that many of the host - derived intracellular protein aggregates previously noted also contain host mRNA [ 113 , 114 , 116 , 117 ] . It is reasonable to conclude that if the ICIs observed in KD patients were related to one of these structures , they would positively stain for RNA .
